original: 濟南著縣人，西晉官員。為人清高有節，不逢迎權貴，素有名聲。但在平定羌胡叛亂時，不救周處，導致周處戰死。最終在八王之亂期間被趙王司馬倫殺害。
text: A native of Jinan County, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty. He has a reputation for being a noble and respectable person, not welcoming the powerful. However, when the Qianghu rebellion was put down, Zhou Chu was not saved and Zhou Chu died in battle. Eventually he was killed by Zhao Wang Simalun during the Eight Kings Rebellion.
